page.title: 03LIFE IN A TOWER BLOCK.
page.content: {I live in Cottingley Heights,the}high- est block of flats in Leeds,having 24 storeys. {As the lifts often breakdown,I am glad that my flat is on the ground floor. The flats were opened in April,1972 by Alderman Bellow,Leader of the Leeds City Council.I do not like living in the flats because pets are not allowed and I would love to have a dog.{I have a key which opens the main door to the flats.When my friends call they have to speak to me through an intercom system,and then I press a button in the flat which opens the main door.{The view from the top of the flats is fantastic.I can see all over Leeds,and on a very clear day,York Minster is visible,26 miles away.
